Mayo Host is Fast & [affordable web hosting](https://mayohost.com/web-hosting.php) provider. Data center is located in USA Los Angeles. 

_Opal - $6/Year OR 0.5$/Month_

*  3 Domain
*  500MB Disk Space
*  Unlimited Sub Domains
*  Unlimited Email Accounts
*  Unlimited MySQL Databases
*  Unlimited FTP Accounts
*  [More Info](https://mayohost.com/web-hosting.php)  | [Order  Now](https://mayohost.com/account/order/config/index/webhosting/?group_id=3&pricing_id=1)

_Emarald Plan - $9/Year OR 0.75$Month_

*  5 Domain
*  1GB Disk Space
*  Unlimited Sub Domains
*  Unlimited Email Accounts
*  Unlimited MySQL Databases
*  Unlimited FTP Accounts
*  [More Info](https://mayohost.com/web-hosting.php)  | [Order  Now](https://mayohost.com/account/order/config/index/webhosting/?group_id=3&pricing_id=2)

_Ruby - $12/Year OR 1$/Month_

*  Unlimited Domains
*  25GB Disk Space
*  Unlimited Sub Domains
*  Unlimited Email Accounts
*  Unlimited MySQL Databases
*  Unlimited FTP Accounts
*  [More Info](https://mayohost.com/web-hosting.php)  | [Order  Now](https://mayohost.com/account/order/config/index/webhosting/?group_id=3&pricing_id=3)

**Payment Modes**

We accept PayPal, Credit Card, Perfect Money, Bitcoins & Other Cryptocurrencies.

If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at **admin@mayohost.com**
